üè• 1. Not Medical Advice

IMPORTANT MEDICAL DISCLAIMER: Quantum Merlin does NOT provide medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Our frequency analysis, numerology, and wellness insights are for entertainment and personal reflection ONLY.

Quantum Merlin is NOT:

  • A substitute for professional medical diagnosis
  • A replacement for doctor consultations
  • Medical treatment or therapy of any kind
  • A tool for diagnosing health conditions

ALWAYS:

  • Consult qualified healthcare providers for medical concerns
  • Follow your doctor's advice and prescribed treatments
  • Seek emergency care when needed
  • Disclose all treatments to your healthcare team

üß† 2. Mental Health Disclaimer

MENTAL HEALTH WARNING: Our services are NOT therapy, counseling, or mental health treatment. If you are experiencing a mental health crisis, please seek professional help immediately.

Quantum Merlin should never be used as a substitute for:

  • Professional therapy or counseling
  • Psychiatric treatment or medication
  • Crisis intervention services
  • Support groups or rehabilitation programs

üíö If You're in Crisis, Please Reach Out

National Suicide Prevention Lifeline: 988 (US)

Crisis Text Line: Text HOME to 741741

International Association for Suicide Prevention: Find Your Country's Resources

You matter. Help is available. You are not alone.

üíº 3. Financial & Legal Disclaimer

Quantum Merlin does NOT provide:

  • Financial advice, investment recommendations, or trading guidance
  • Legal advice, counsel, or representation
  • Tax advice or accounting services
  • Business or career counseling as professional services

For financial decisions, consult a licensed financial advisor. For legal matters, consult a licensed attorney. Our cosmic insights are for inspiration only.
